step.datasource: select i.id from [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.ItemAccounts i with (nolock) inner join [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy c with (nolock) on c.cmp_wwn = i.accountcode left outer join [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.cicmpy c2 with (nolock) on c.debnr = c2.debnr left outer join [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.ItemAccounts i2 with (nolock) on c2.cmp_wwn = i2.accountcode and i.itemcode = i2.itemcode where 1=1 and i2.id is null and c2.id is not null and c2.cmp_status = 'A' and c2.cmp_type = 'C'

select c2.cmp_wwn as accountcode, i.itemcode ,i.[crdnr] ,i.[MainAccount] ,i.[ItemCodeAccount] ,i.[EANCode] ,i.[PurchaseCurrency] ,i.[PurchasePrice] ,i.[PurchaseVATCode] ,i.[PurchaseVATPerc] ,i.[PurchaseVATIncl] ,i.[PurchaseUnit] ,i.[PurchasePackage] ,i.[PurchaseUnitToInternalUnitFactor] ,i.[PurchaseUnitToPurchasePackageFactor] ,i.[PurchaseOrderSize] ,i.[DiscountMargin] ,i.[SalesPriceRecommended] ,i.[SlsPkgsPerPurPkg] ,i.[DeliveryTimeInDays] ,i.[DeliverableFromStock] ,i.[DocumentID] ,i.[SupplierPreference] ,i.[StatisticalFactor] ,i.[Warranty] ,i.[CountryOfOrigin] ,i.[Division] ,i.[syscreated] ,i.[syscreator] ,i.[sysmodified] ,i.[sysmodifier] ,i.[sysguid] ,i.[timestamp] from [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.ItemAccounts i with (nolock) inner join [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.cicmpy c with (nolock) on c.cmp_wwn = i.accountcode left outer join [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy c2 with (nolock) on c.debnr = c2.debnr left outer join [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.ItemAccounts i2 with (nolock) on c2.cmp_wwn = i2.accountcode and i.itemcode = i2.itemcode left outer join [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.items it with (nolock) on i.itemcode = it.itemcode where 1=1 and i2.id is null and it.id is not null and c2.id is not null and c2.cmp_status = 'A' and c2.cmp_type = 'C'

select i2.id, c2.cmp_wwn as accountcode, i.itemcode ,i.[crdnr] ,i.[MainAccount] ,i.[ItemCodeAccount] ,i.[EANCode] ,i.[PurchaseCurrency] ,i.[PurchasePrice] ,i.[PurchaseVATCode] ,i.[PurchaseVATPerc] ,i.[PurchaseVATIncl] ,i.[PurchaseUnit] ,i.[PurchasePackage] ,i.[PurchaseUnitToInternalUnitFactor] ,i.[PurchaseUnitToPurchasePackageFactor] ,i.[PurchaseOrderSize] ,i.[DiscountMargin] ,i.[SalesPriceRecommended] ,i.[SlsPkgsPerPurPkg] ,i.[DeliveryTimeInDays] ,i.[DeliverableFromStock] ,i.[DocumentID] ,i.[SupplierPreference] ,i.[StatisticalFactor] ,i.[Warranty] ,i.[CountryOfOrigin] ,i.[Division] ,i.[syscreated] ,i.[syscreator] ,i.[sysmodified] ,i.[sysmodifier] ,i.[sysguid] ,i.[timestamp] from [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.ItemAccounts i with (nolock) inner join [%abeisourcedb%].dbo.cicmpy c with (nolock) on c.cmp_wwn = i.accountcode inner join [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.cicmpy c2 with (nolock) on c.debnr = c2.debnr inner join [%abeitargetdb%].dbo.ItemAccounts i2 with (nolock) on c2.cmp_wwn = i2.accountcode and i.itemcode = i2.itemcode where 1=1 and c.cmp_status = 'A' and c.cmp_type = 'C' and i.itemcodeaccount != i2.itemcodeaccount
